tool_description: This API returns the daily news  title along with URL from news24.
name: Covid19-DailyNews
title: Covid19-DailyNews

api_list.name: Get Today's Covid-19 News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the news of the day from covid-19.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid19-dailynews.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid19-dailynews.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid19-dailynews.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid19-dailynews.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
